remarks:
Deduction quantifying both antecedent and consequent, based on Theorem 19.20 of [Margaris] p. 90.  (Contributed by NM, 22-May-1999.)  Reduce dependencies on axioms.  (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 5-Dec-2019.)

 Deduction quantifying both antecedent and consequent, based on Theorem 19.20 of [Margaris] p. 90.  (Contributed by NM, 22-May-1999.)
statement:
ralimdva.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> ( ps -> ch ) ) $.
ralimdva $p |- ( ph -> ( A. x e. A ps -> A. x e. A ch ) ) $.
$d ph x $.
